TestCase.name: testSortProcessingTime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) StreamExecTemporalSort(orderBy=[proctime ASC, c ASC]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSortRowTime
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) StreamExecTemporalSort(orderBy=[rowtime ASC, c ASC]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSortProcessingTimeWithLimit
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[proctime ASC, c ASC], fetch=[2], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testSortRowTimeWithLimit
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) StreamExecRank(orderBy=[rowtime ASC, c ASC], fetch=[2], strategy=[AppendFastRank], rank=[ROW_NUMBER], select=[*]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[single]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) StreamExecSort(orderBy=[proctime DESC, c ASC]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[a]) StreamExecSort(orderBy=[rowtime DESC, c ASC]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])
